summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a financial matter related to a $50 million commercial mortgage that is due in five years. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and suggests it may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing financial matters related to a mortgage.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, to whom Epstein is requesting information regarding a mortgage.

connections.description: Epstein is seeking assistance from Staley regarding a financial matter.

keyFacts: The email discusses a $50 million commercial mortgage due in five years.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Epstein requests the name of a person who could hedge the mortgage.
